name: Cleopterix

skills.name: Death Dive
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns. The chance increases to 50% if the target is under a [Hex] debuff. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this champion for 1 turn if this attack kills an enemy under [Hex] debuff.

effects.notes: Single-target attack. 3.5 ATK base (3.85 ATK booked with +10% damage).
CONDITIONAL: 30% chance Weaken (25%) for 2 turns base (50% booked). Increases to 50% base (70% booked) if target under Hex. Good for damage boost synergy.
CONDITIONAL: Places Perfect Veil on Cleopterix for 1 turn if A1 kills enemy under Hex. Perfect Veil = cannot be targeted (stealth). CHEESE POTENTIAL: Kill Hexed enemy → stealth → safety.

skills.book_value: Medium: +10% damage + 20% Weaken chance (30%→50% base, 50%→70% vs Hex). Decent for Weaken uptime.
skills.notes: HEX SYNERGY: Weaken chance increases (30%→50% base) if target under Hex. Perfect Veil on kill vs Hexed enemy (stealth for 1 turn). Good for Arena (8/10) with stealth cycling. 200+ ACC needed. Synergizes with A3 Hex application.

skills.name: Feather Barrage
skills.description: Places a 30% [Increase C.RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C.DMG] buff on this champion for 2 turns, then attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns on targets under [Hex] debuffs.

effects.notes: SELF-BUFF: +30% C.RATE for Cleopterix for 2 turns. EXCELLENT for crit setup (45% C.RATE with base 15%). Cast before AoE attack.
SELF-BUFF: +30% C.DMG for Cleopterix for 2 turns. EXCELLENT for damage boost (93% C.DMG with base 63%). Cast before AoE attack.
AoE attack AFTER self-buffs. 4.5 ATK base (4.95 ATK booked with +10% damage). Hits with boosted C.RATE + C.DMG.
CONDITIONAL HEX SYNERGY: 75% chance Block Active Skills (2 turns) base (100% booked) on targets under Hex. EXCELLENT for Arena CC (blocks A2/A3/A4). Requires A3 Hex setup.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +10% damage + 25% Block Active Skills chance (75%→100%) + -1 cooldown (4→3). MUST BOOK for Arena CC.
skills.notes: NUKER SETUP: Inc C.RATE (30%) + Inc C.DMG (30%) THEN AoE attack (4.5 ATK). MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown. HEX SYNERGY: 100% Block Active Skills (2 turns) on Hexed targets. EXCELLENT for Arena (8/10) with CC combo (A3 Hex → A2 Block Active Skills). 200+ ACC needed.

skills.name: Sky Punishment
skills.description: Places a 50% [Increase ACC] buff on this champion for 2 turns, then attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Hex] debuff for 3 turns. Has a 100% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff for 1 turn instead on enemies under [Hex] debuffs.

effects.notes: SELF-BUFF: +50% ACC for Cleopterix for 2 turns. EXCELLENT for debuff accuracy (effective 250 ACC at 200 base). Cast before AoE attack.
AoE attack AFTER Inc ACC buff. 4.7 ATK base (5.405 ATK booked with +15% damage). Highest AoE multiplier.
PRIMARY DEBUFF: 75% chance Hex (3 turns) base (100% booked). Hex = +15% damage taken from all sources. CRITICAL for A1/A2 synergy (Weaken chance, Block Active Skills).
CONDITIONAL UPGRADE: 100% Fear (1 turn) INSTEAD of Hex if target already under Hex. Fear = cannot use active skills, random A1 attacks. EXCELLENT for Arena CC (Hex → Fear combo).

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: +15% damage + 25% debuff chance (75%→100%) + -1 cooldown (5→4). MUST BOOK for Hex/Fear uptime.
skills.notes: SETUP SKILL: Inc ACC (50%) THEN AoE Hex (100% booked, 3 turns) OR Fear (100%, 1 turn if target already Hexed). MUST BOOK for 4-turn cooldown. COMBO: A3 Hex → A2 Block Active Skills = 100% CC lock. EXCELLENT for Arena (8/10) and Doom Tower (8/10) with CC combo. 200+ ACC (effective 300 with buff).

skills.name: Countermand
skills.description: Counterattacks with the default skill every time this Champion loses 30% HP or more in a single turn. Always counterattacks when attacked if 2 or more allies are dead.

effects.notes: PASSIVE COUNTERATTACK: Counterattacks with A1 when losing 30%+ HP in single turn. ALWAYS counterattacks when attacked if 2+ allies dead. EXCELLENT for Arena (8/10) survivability (A1 Weaken + Perfect Veil on kill). Synergizes with Lifesteal set.

skills.notes: PASSIVE COUNTERATTACK: A1 counterattack on 30%+ HP loss in single turn OR when 2+ allies dead. EXCELLENT for Arena survivability (counterattack → Weaken → potential Perfect Veil on Hexed kill). Synergizes with Lifesteal set for sustain.

forms.aura: Increases Ally C.DMG in Faction Crypts by 30%
forms.comments: LEGENDARY nuker/CC specialist with HEX SYNERGY. A3 'Sky Punishment' applies Hex (100% booked, 3 turns) or Fear (100%, 1 turn if Hexed). A2 'Feather Barrage' self-buffs Inc C.RATE/C.DMG then AoE + Block Active Skills (100% booked on Hexed targets). A1 Weaken (70% booked vs Hex) + Perfect Veil on Hexed kill. Passive counterattack on 30%+ HP loss or 2+ allies dead. EXCELLENT for Arena (8/10) and Faction Wars (8/10). Must book A2/A3.

masteries.general: WARMASTER for all content (single-hit A1/A2/A3). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 5→4 booked cooldowns for CC rotation). Master Hexer CRITICAL (extends Hex 3→4 turns for longer CC/synergy window). Retribution (synergizes with passive counterattack on 30%+ HP loss). Flawless Execution + Ruthless Ambush (C.DMG boost). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for Arena/FW viability (3-turn Inc C.RATE/C.DMG + Block Active Skills, 4-turn Inc ACC + Hex/Fear). Build: 100% C.RATE (or 70%+ with A2 buff), 250%+ C.DMG, 4000+ ATK, 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC (effective 300 with A3 Inc ACC), 40000+ HP, 2000+ DEF. Savage or Cruel or Lifesteal sets. Focus: Arena (8/10) with Hex → Block Active Skills CC combo. Excellent for Faction Wars (8/10) and Doom Tower (8/10) with CC control. User Priority: Knight Revenant specialist for FW + Arena. COMBO: A3 Hex (100% booked) → A2 Block Active Skills (100% booked on Hexed) = guaranteed CC lock. Spirit affinity = neutral vs Force/Magic, weak to Void.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will use A3 for Hex/Fear, A2 for Inc C.RATE/C.DMG + Block Active Skills, A1 for Weaken. Passive auto-triggers. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Hex → Block Active Skills CC Lock
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: CHEESE POTENTIAL: A3 Hex (100% booked, 3 turns) → A2 Block Active Skills (100% booked on Hexed targets, 2 turns) = guaranteed CC lock for 2 turns. Enemies under Hex + Block Active Skills cannot use A2/A3/A4 = severely crippled. COMBO: A3 Inc ACC (50%, effective 300 ACC at 200 base) → Hex (100%) → A2 Block Active Skills (100% on Hexed) → enemies locked for 2 turns. If Hex lands on turn 1, can apply Fear (100%, 1 turn) instead on turn 2 for additional CC. EXCELLENT for Arena (8/10) and Doom Tower (8/10) with CC control. Passive counterattack on 30%+ HP loss → A1 Weaken → potential Perfect Veil on Hexed kill = survivability + stealth cycling. Synergizes with Lifesteal set for sustain during counterattacks.
